Accounting Infrastructure
for Modern Platforms

The double-entry accounting API that handles everything: expense tracking, revenue splits, creator payouts, and tax compliance. One API call, perfect books.

Start Free TrialView API Docs

✓ 14-day free trial · ✓ No credit card required · ✓ Full API access

record-sale.js
// One API call = complete accounting
const sale = await soledgic.recordSale({
  creator_id: "author_jane",
  amount: 2999,        // $29.99
  reference_id: "stripe_pi_xxx"
});

// Response: Automatic 80/20 split
{
  "creator_balance": 2399,  // $23.99
  "platform_revenue": 600,  // $6.00
  "transaction_id": "txn_abc123"
}

Double-entry

Auto-balanced

Instant

<50ms latency

WHAT YOU CAN DO

One API. Complete Accounting.

Everything you need to track money flowing in and out. Via dashboard or API.

Record Sales

Log revenue with optional creator splits. Stripe webhook fires, one API call, books updated.

POST /record-sale
  • Automatic revenue splits
  • Creator balance tracking
  • Idempotency via reference_id

Track Expenses

Log business expenses with IRS-mapped categories. Software, ads, contractors, travel—all tracked.

POST /record-expense
  • 30+ IRS categories
  • Receipt attachment
  • Vendor tracking

Process Payouts

Pay creators and contractors. Balance validation, fee handling, complete audit trail.

POST /process-payout
  • Available balance check
  • Fee deduction options
  • 1099 threshold tracking

Handle Refunds

Process refunds with automatic split reversal. Creator balance adjusted, books stay balanced.

POST /record-refund
  • Automatic split reversal
  • Balance adjustment
  • Original transaction link

Generate Reports

P&L statements, trial balance, transaction logs. CPA-ready exports in JSON or CSV.

GET /profit-loss
  • Income statement
  • Expense breakdown
  • Date range filtering

Bank Reconciliation

Match ledger entries to bank statements. Find discrepancies. Lock closed periods.

POST /reconcile
  • Statement matching
  • Discrepancy tracking
  • Period locking

TWO MODES

Choose your starting point.

Same powerful engine. Different defaults and terminology.

Standard Mode

For freelancers, agencies & SMBs

Traditional business accounting. Track every dollar in and out with proper categorization.

  • Income & expense tracking
  • Receipt uploads with OCR
  • IRS Schedule C categories
  • Contractor 1099 management
  • Tax reserve calculations
  • P&L and cash flow reports

Perfect for:

FreelancersConsultantsAgenciesStartups
POPULAR

Marketplace Mode

For creator platforms

Built for platforms splitting revenue with creators. Automatic balances and payouts.

  • Configurable revenue splits
  • Creator balance tracking
  • Batch payout processing
  • 1099 threshold alerts at $600
  • W-9 status management
  • Webhook notifications

Perfect for:

Course platformsMarketplacesPublishingAffiliates

API-FIRST

Built for developers.

Every feature is accessible via REST API. Record transactions from your payment webhooks, generate reports for your dashboard, process payouts from your admin panel.

Instant Integration

Connect in minutes, not weeks

Idempotent Endpoints

Safe retries, no double-entries

Webhook Events
